labels.ignored_avatar: If a returned avatar is equal to this, it will not be set from auth. This can be used to ignore default avatar values.
labels.stop_avatar_change: Block users from changing their avatar from flarum?
labels.stop_bio_change: Block users from changing their bio from flarum? (Requires Friends of Flarum User Bio extension)
labels.sync_bio: Sync Bio? (Requires Friends of Flarum User Bio extension)
labels.sync_masquerade: Sync Masquerade Attributes? Requires Friends of Flarum Masquerade extension.
